name: Tone Friends
description:
A cute collection of music and sound games for anyone to play!

Includes 5 minigames:

-GARBAGEMAN
collect friends and collect their garbage!

-FUTBOLLER
virtual foosball!

-CEPHALOBEAT
ur an octopus! play the drums!

-CHORDAREGN
soothing rain teaches chords!

-WAAVFORMS
bring party people onto your spaceship!

Uses only the arrow keys, so just about anyone can figure out ways to have fun!

Tone Friends uses the SiON flash framework by Kei Mesuda, so all sound is generated in game, which is pretty neat I guess! It also uses the Flixel flash framework by Adam "Atomic" Saltsman!
